original_text: When all the work Solomon had done for the temple of the Lord was finished, he brought in the things his father David had dedicated—the silver and gold and all the furnishings—and he placed them in the treasuries of God’s temple.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전을 위하여 만드는 모든 일을 마친지라 이에 솔로몬이 그의 아버지 다윗이 드린 은과 금과 모든 기구를 가져다가 하나님의 전 곳간에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: When all the work Solomon had done for the temple of the Lord was finished
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 주의 성전을 위해 한 모든 일이 끝났을 때

sentences.original_text: he brought in the things his father David had dedicated
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지 다윗이 구별했던 것들을 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: the silver and gold and all the furnishings
and he placed them in the treasuries of God's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 하나님의 성전 보물창고에 두었다
